text: Abdikadir Yusuf Aar () aka Sheikh Qalbi, was an Islamic terrorist and senior Al-Shabaab officer from the Juba region. He had been a member of Al-Itihaad Al-Islamiya (AIAI) in Luq from 1995 to 2002. In Al-Shabab he served as leader in both Juba and Gedo regions. During the "anti-insurgency offensive" launched by TFG and AMISOM to drive Al-Shabab out of Mogadishu he was killed in action (KIA) near to the former Defense Ministry in Mogadishu on March 16, 2011. ==References== Category:20th-century births Category:2011 deaths Category:Somalian Islamists Category:Al-Shabaab (militant group) members
title: Abdikadir Yusuf Aar
